Verses: 1 mavunamaayirukkiravargale, Neengal Meyyaai Needhiyaip Pesuveergalo? Manupuththirare, Niyaayamaaith Theerppuseyveergalo?
2 manadhaara Niyaayakkedu Seygireergal; Boomiyile Ungal Kaigalin Kodumaiyai Niruththuk Kodukkireergal.
3 dhunmaarkkar Karppaththil Urpaviththadhumudhal Pedhalikkiraargal; Thaayin Vayitrilirundhu Pirandhadhumudhal Poi Solli Vazhithappip Pogiraargal.
4 sarppaththin Vishaththirku Oppaana Visham Avargalil Irukkiradhu.
5 paambaattigal Vinodhamaai Oodhinaalum Avargal Oodhum Saththaththirkuch Sevikodaadhapadikkuth Than Kaadhai Adaikkira Sevittu Viriyanaippol Irukkiraargal.
6 dhevane, Avargal Vaayilulla Parkalaith Thagarththuppodum; Karththaave, Baalasingangalin Kadaivaaipparkalai Norukkippodum.
7 kadandhodugira Thanneeraippol Avargal Kazhindhupogattum; Avan Than Ambugalaith Thodukkumpodhu Avaigal Sinnapinnamaaip Pogakkadavadhu.
8 karaindhupogira Naththaiyaippol Ozhindhupovaargalaaga; Sthireeyin Mudhiraap Pindaththaippol Sooriyanaik Kaanaadhiruppaargalaaga.
9 mul Neruppinaal Ungal Paanaigalil Sooderumunne Pachchaiyaanadhaiyum Erindhuponadhaiyum Avar Suzhalkaatrinaal Adiththukkondupovaar.
10 pazhivaangudhalai Needhimaan Kaanumbodhu Magizhuvaan; Avan Than Paadhangalaith Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Raththaththile Kazhuvuvaan.
11 appozhudhu, Meyyaai Needhimaanukkup Balan Undendrum, Meyyaai Boomiyile Niyaayanjeygira Dhevan Undendrum Manushan Solluvaan.
